verbose_text: After 10 min, the following recombinant cytokines (purchased from Peprotech, Rocky Hill, NJ) were added for 10 min to induce phosphorylation of NF-kappaB p65, STAT1, and STAT3 : interleukin (IL)-1beta (at a final concentration of 20 ng/mL), interferon-gamma (IFN-gamma) (10 3 IU/mL), and IL-10 (100 ng/mL), respectively.
evidence: phosphorylation of NF-kappaB p65, STAT1, and STAT3
